title: Luke Blake
text:
Luke Blake is a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who most recently played for the <a href="Batley%20Bulldogs">Batley Bulldogs</a> in the <a href="Kingstone%20Press%20Championship">Kingstone Press Championship</a>. He has also played for the <a href="Wakefield%20Trinity">Wakefield Trinity Wildcats</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Wakefield%20Trinity%20players">Heritage № 1268</a>), and <a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a>, as .
Personal.
Luke Blake is the cousin, and former team mate of <a href="Leon%20Walker">Leon Walker</a>.
